metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2849 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Botan before 1.10.13 and 1.11.x before 1.11.29 do not use a constant-time algorithm to perform a modular inverse on the signature nonce k, which might allow remote attackers to obtain ECDSA secret keys via a timing side-channel attack.

criterions.comment: botan1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
